title: Email Marketing Designer (Sugar Market Exp.)
job_overview:
This fast-growing marketing services company is on a mission to help B2B brands deliver high-performing campaigns through thoughtful design and automation. Their team combines creativity, technical expertise, and data to drive engagement, loyalty, and revenue for clients across industries.

They’re now expanding their creative team and looking for an **Email Marketing Designer** with a unique blend of technical email expertise and strong visual design skills. If you’re a creative thinker who thrives at the intersection of strategy, design, and analytics — this role is for you.

Perks & Benefits

- Paid in USD, with bi-monthly payouts (15th & 30th)
- Up to 14 days paid time off annually (starting Day 1)
- Paid time off for Philippine Regular Holidays (if applicable)
- 100% remote – work from anywhere
- Join a collaborative, results-driven team supporting international B2B brands

What You’ll Do

 Graphic & Email Design (Must-Have!)

- Design visually stunning, on-brand emails and creative assets
- Create graphics for emails, social media, and digital ads using Adobe Creative Suite
- Ensure emails are mobile-responsive, accessible, and optimized for performance
- Maintain consistency with brand guidelines and visual identity across all campaigns for each manufacturer
 
Email Marketing & Sugar Market Management

- Design, build, and execute email campaigns using Sugar Market’s drag-and-drop builder
- Create and manage automated flows for lifecycle, retention, and promotional campaigns in the B2B space
- Monitor and report on email performance KPIs (open rate, CTR, conversions, unsubscribes)
- Conduct regular A/B testing of subject lines, layouts, content, and send times
- Ensure deliverability, list health, and compliance with email marketing regulations (CAN-SPAM, GDPR)

What We’re Looking For

- 2+ years of experience in email marketing, preferably in an eCommerce or B2B environment
- Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign)
- Proficiency with Sugar Market or similar platforms (e.g., Klaviyo, HubSpot, Mailchimp)
- Strong skills in graphic design and layout with a portfolio of email examples
- Solid understanding of email design best practices, responsive design, and HTML/CSS (basic knowledge is a plus)
- Ability to manage multiple projects, deadlines, and priorities with excellent time management
- Familiarity with email compliance laws (CAN-SPAM, GDPR, etc.)
- Strong attention to detail, copywriting instincts, and a collaborative mindset

Bonus Points For

- Experience with other CRM or automation tools
- Copywriting or editing experience for subject lines, CTAs, and body content
- Familiarity with AI use such as ChatGPT or Google Gemini
- Understanding of customer journey mapping and behavioral targeting

How to Apply

Please submit the following:

- Your resume
- Your portfolio (including at least 2 email designs or campaign examples)
- A 1–2 minute Loom video introducing yourself
- Any case studies or metrics tied to your past campaigns (if available)
